headline: Edison International Celebrates Lineworker Scholarship Recipients
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., July 10, 2025--Edison International today announced 12 recipients of its Lineworker Scholarship Program, which awards up to $25,000 per recipient to pursue careers in the skilled trade workforce at Southern California Edison (SCE). The announcement coincides with National Lineworker Appreciation Day, celebrated by the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers (IBEW), the National Electrical Contractors Association (NECA) and the Edison Electric Institute (EEI) in recognit
